revision.text: {{Infobox musical artist |name = Dominika Mirgová |image = |caption = |background = solo_singer |birth_name = |birth_date = {{Birth date and age|df=yes|1991|12|23}} |death_date = |origin = [[Trnava]], [[Czechoslovakia]] |instrument = [[Vocals]] |genre = |occupation = [[Singer]] |years_active = 2007- |label = |associated_acts = |website = http://www.dominikamirgova.sk/bio }} '''Dominika Mirgová''' (born 23 December 1991) is a Slovak singer and actress from [[Trnava]]. She first appeared at age 15 in the third season of [[Slovensko hľadá SuperStar]] which is based on the British TV-show [[Pop Idol]], where she came in second. One year later in 2008 she debuted with her first solo album.{{cite news|title=Dominika Mirgova - profil|url=http://hudba.zoznam.sk/dominika-mirgova/|accessdate=3 December 2013|newspaper=Hudba.sk}}{{cite news|title=Speváčka Dominika Mirgová (21) si svoje prvé výročie randenia s priateľom Petrom dobre zapamätá|url=http://www.cas.sk/clanok/251512/spevacka-dominika-mirgova-dostala-tortu-s-vlastnou-fotkou.html|accessdate=3 December 2013|newspaper=cas.sk|language=Slovak}} ==Singles== * '''2010''': ''Cesta snov'' * '''2013''': ''Je Koniec'' (ft. Kali) * '''2013''': ''L.A.S.K.A.'' (ft. [[Rakby]]) * '''2013''': ''Swing'' (ft. Mafia Corner) ==Albums== * '''2008''': ''Dominika Mirgová'' * '''2012''': ''[[NOVÁ]]'' ==References== {{reflist}} {{Persondata | NAME =Mirgová, Dominika | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Slovakian singer | DATE OF BIRTH =23 December 1991 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Mirgova, Dominika}} [[Category:1991 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Slovak musicians]] [[Category:People from Trnava]] [[Category:Slovak Eurovision Song Contest entrants]] {{europe-singer-stub}} {{Slovakia-bio-stub}}
